author: makortel
body:
This PR updates the `TrackingNtuple` as follows
- Fix TrackingVertex->TrackingParticle links
- Added information
  * about TrackingParticles
     * GenParticle pdgId and flag telling if the TP originates from a B hadron
     * TrackingParticle->seed links
  * about seeds
     * starting state
     * SeedStopReason
- Ntuple python library
  * Classes to provide "default" printouts for seeds, tracks, and TrackingParticles
     * Includes parsing of DetId (currently in a hardcoded/copy-paste way, to be improved in the near future)
  * Split the library to multiple files as it had become enormous
- Two new scripts (in `$PATH`)
  * `printTrackingNtuple.py` to print information on a track/seed/TrackingParticle/hit
  * `diffTrackingNtuple.py` to produce a diff  la "unified diff" of two ntuples (assumed to have the same hits and TrackingParticles)
     * possibility to diff only a single event, or a single track
     * tracks between the ntuples are matched first by their TrackingParticle matches, and that failing, by hits they share (the overall machinery evolved to be quite complex)

The SeedStopReason is added as an optional product of `CkfTrackCandidateMaker` (disabled by default) to provide details of why a seed did not make a track.

Tested in 9_0_0_pre5, should have no effect on standard workflows.

@rovere @VinInn @ebrondol
title: Improve TrackingNtuple, add optional SeedStopReason to CkfTrackCandidateMaker
